DOC.brief_summary: An assessment of the surgical performance of DisCoVisc compared to Healon5 during cataract surgery with intraocular lens implantation where miotic/small pupils or intraoperative Floppy Iris Syndrome exists.
DOC.criteria: diagnosed with floppy iris syndrome operable bilateral cataracts Intraocular Pressure (IOP) > 21mmHg ocular inflammatory disease systemic or ocular diseases affecting Endothelial Cell Count
